snippet.title: PAYDAY: Don't Be a Hero Trailer
snippet.description:
Don't Be a Hero puts you in the shoes of a civilian, in the middle of a Payday heist! Play the game now, for free, in a browser of your choice: https://t.paydaythegame.com/c/de2uz4

👇 Stay connected 👇
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/PAYDAYGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/paydaygame/
Discord: https://discord.gg/paydaygame
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/paydaythegame/
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@paydaygame

Buy the game: https://www.paydaythegame.com/buy/
Visit our website: https://www.paydaythegame.com/
